commit.message:
gfortran.texi (Status): Fix typos.

2012-02-17  Tobias Burnus  <burnus@net-b.de>

        * gfortran.texi (Status): Fix typos.
        * invoke.texi (ffixed-form, fstack-arrays): Spell Fortran with
        a majuscule.

From-SVN: r184332
